{{ product.nombre }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PokeServices } from '../../services/pokeServices'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clientes', templateUrl: './clientes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clientes.component.css'] }) export class ClientesComponent implements OnInit { datos:any; products:any[] = []; constructor(private pokeServices: PokeServices) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.pokeServices.sendGetRequest() .subscribe( res => { this.datos = res; console.log(this.datos); this.products = this.datos; }, err => console.log(err) ) } }
